EntryName	TPGS2_HUMAN
ProteinName	Tubulin polyglutamylase complex subunit 2 (PGs2)
GeneName	TPGS2 C18orf10 HMFN0601 L17
Length	300
Function	Subunit of the tubulin polyglutamylase complex (TPGC). The complex mediates cilia and flagella polyglutamylation which is essential for their biogenesis and motility.
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Cytoskeleton; Cytoplasm; Cytoskeleton; Microtubule organizing center; Centrosome; Centriolar satellite
